TopicTitle: G'Day all Kerbonauts and Earthonauts, p0Rtal.co here!

Articles.Content:
G'Day mates!

p0Rtal.co owner, Liam Kerman (yes, Liam is my real name) here.

I am new to the forums and i hope to purchase the full game soon.

on a side note, could i have a tutorial or something on how to get my avatar (pic)

Thanks, Liam ;D

Edited May 30, 2013 by p0Rtal.co Products

Welcome to the forums!

Avatars, signatures, and other forum goodies come once you've made a certain number of posts and a moderator has verified that you're not a spambot. It's a security measure of sorts, from what I gather.

Speaking of tutorials, feel free to check out the Drawing Board (link in my sig) for some useful reference materials, some of which have been especially created for new players. Don't be afraid to ask questions in the How To section of the forums, either; most of the people who frequently post there will be more than willing to share their accumulated knowledge to answer them.

Happy landings!
The one moment where you need to post more to get official privileges but cant think of anything to post XD
i don't have the full game yet, just the demo, so my list of things to say are restricted to random stuff and ponies.
